page.title: 02Leechmere Industrial Estate
page.content: There were five in our group. It was a very hot sunny day, just the day to do it. We were sweltering. We went to the{Leechmere Industrial Estate} and when we got there we asked people about the{factories.}We wrote the names of the factories down and what they made. At the car clinic we saw the men spraying the cars and they were putting new bodies on some of them. There were some cars that had very big dents on the side. At the Abbey T.V. we thought they did only repairs but they sell them as well and Anthony got his telly there. There was a man making one-armed bandits and at Hawkins we saw sacks of peeled potatoes ready to go to the chip shops. We were surprised at the great variety of factories on the estate.
